meanings.sent1: The cat slank through the grass without making a sound.
meanings.sent2: She slank into the room, trying not to disturb anyone.
meanings.sent3: The ninja slank past the guards, unseen and unheard.
meanings.sent4: The fog slank through the valley, enveloping everything in its quiet embrace.
meanings.sent5: As the ghost slank through the haunted house, it sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.sent1: The slank model walked confidently down the runway.
meanings.sent2: He had a slank physique that made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The slank tree swayed gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her slank figure made her the envy of her friends.
meanings.sent5: The slank cheetah sprinted across the savanna with unmatched speed.

meanings.sent1: She slank away from the scene before anyone noticed.
meanings.sent2: He slank out of the room, hoping to avoid any confrontation.
meanings.sent3: The thief slank through the dark alley, clutching his loot.
meanings.sent4: The shadows slank across the room as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: The memories of that day slank into the depths of his mind, never to resurface.
